title: Dear Riot, please may I PBE test Eve <3
body:
Dear Riot,

I know you don't have PBE openings at the moment, however I love Eve and have been dying to play her rework, especially since you rumoured last year that she was meant to be released in July. 

I'm not asking for a permanent account, but maybe a 1-day access kind of thing?

Also, think of it this way... How many Eve OTPs are actually on the PBE? Sure, there may be people who play her every now and then, but they aren't OTPs. Imagine how useful an OTP would be for reviewing the champion. 

This also isn't a *completely* selfish request. I do also have a YT and Twitch channel, and I can't really find many other Eve OTP channels out there. I would be recording and reviewing everything from an OTPs PoV (which would be really helpful), and it would also be on r/evelynnmains, so they can dissect it as well. 

I'm not sure how many PBE requests you get like this, but please could you consider this?

Also, if this isn't the best way to make contact with Riot with regards to this, what would be?

Many thanks and hope,
Little Witch Eve

<3
